      • getNeighboringSugarAgents

        public java.util.Set<SugarAgent_ch2> getNeighboringSugarAgents()
        Gets the neighboring SugarAgent_ch2s of the SugarAgent_ch2. We assume that 'neighboring agents' are those that occupy a GridPoint seen from the agent. The latter dependes on the VisionAbility of the agent.
        Parameters:
        a - The SugarAgent_ch2 for whom to find the neighbor
        Returns:
        an Iterable of SugarAgent_ch2s. If none, returns an empty one.
